entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
